original_text: He will do to me everything that he has decided to do. He has plans to do many things like this. He will do to me everything that he has decided to do.
korean_text: 그런즉 내게 작정하신 것을 이루실 것이라 이런 일이 그에게 많이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: everything that he has decided to do
to do many things like this
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같은 많은 일들을 하기 위한

sentences.original_text: everything that he has decided to do
